Ellen Banks (n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Juun, 1938 rụo ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Mée, 2017) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na-eji naanị egwu e biri ebi dị ka ihe mkpali maka ihe osise ya.

A mụrụ ya na Boston, Banks nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na-enyocha ma ihe osise ma egwu ma Piet Mondrian kpaliri ya. Banks nwetara nzèrè bachelọ ya na Massachusetts College of Art, na-amụkwa na School of the Museum of Fine Arts

Ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya mèrè n'onwe ya n'afọ 1962. Naanị afọ ise ka e mesịrị, na 1967, ọ natara Prix de Paris, a na-egosikwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe. Kemgbe afọ 1981 ọ na-eji egwu egwu dị ka ihe ndabere màkà ọrụ ya.

Banks malitere ọrụ ya na 1962 na gallery mbụ ya. Na mgbakwunye na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Massachusetts College of Art, Banks natara ọzụzụ site n'aka César Domela na Hans Jaffé. Ọ na-enweta mkpali site na naanị egwu egwu e biri ebi kemgbe 1981. Ọ na-ezo aka n'onwe ya dị ka "ónyé na-ese ihe na-anọchite anya ụdị abstracts", a na-egosikwa ọrụ ya pụrụ iche na gallery gafee United States na Europe gụnyere Galerie Spandow, Artu Gallery, na Museum of Modern Art (NYC). Ọ kụziri ihe osise na School of the Museum of Fine Art na Boston (1974-1996), ébé o nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye na ego enyemaka. Banks anọwo na Brooklyn màkà ọtụtụ ọrụ ya.
